dict.acceptation: 各种各样的；多方面的；许多的；各个的，个别的；

sent.orig: Various specifications, various model, various case shape, much circle and single circle.
sent.trans: 多种规格，多种型号，多种封装形状，多圈，单圈。

sent.orig: English apposition has various forms with various semantic relations and various pragmatic functions.
sent.trans: 英语同位语有多种表现形式，体现出多种语义关系和语用功能。

sent.orig: Various fine feeds, various fine chemical raw materials, various minerals, gesso powders and quartz powders.
sent.trans: 各种精细饲料、各种精细化工原料、各种矿物质、石膏粉、石英砂。

sent.orig: Objective To cure various clinical manifestation of spontaneous pneumothorax(SP) through various measures.
sent.trans: 目的通过对多种自发性气胸的临床表现采用不同的治疗方法，达到治愈的效果。

sent.orig: We're making changes in various directions, ie of various types.
sent.trans: 我们正在多方面进行改革。
